get.description: Get a list of the traded companies that polygon.io streams. Company includes some details about the company which we hope to add more to soon.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Which field to sort by. For desc place a `-` in front of the field name. eg `?sort=-marketcap`

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: How many items to be on each page during pagination

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Which page of results to return

get.description: Get a list of the currencies that polygon.io streams.
Get historic aggregations for a symbol.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of the aggregation. `second` or `minute`

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the company to retrieve

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date/Day of the historic ticks to retreive

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Timestamp offset, used for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the size of response, max: 10000

day.description: Date that was evaluated from the request

msLatency.description: Milliseconds of latency for the query results

symbol.description: Symbol that was evaluated from the request

get.description: Get historic ticks for a currency pair. Example for **USD/JPY** the from would be **USD** and to would be **JPY**. The date formatted like **2017-6-22**

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From Symbol of the currency pair

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To Symbol of the currency pair

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date/Day of the historic ticks to retreive

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Timestamp offset, used for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the size of response, max: 10000

day.description: Date that was evaluated from the request

msLatency.description: Milliseconds of latency for the query results

symbol.description: Symbol that was evaluated from the request

get.description: Get historic quotes for a symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the company to retrieve

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date/Day of the historic ticks to retreive

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Timestamp offset, used for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the size of response, max: 10000

day.description: Date that was evaluated from the request

msLatency.description: Milliseconds of latency for the query results

symbol.description: Symbol that was evaluated from the request

get.description: Get historic trades for a symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the company to retrieve

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date/Day of the historic ticks to retreive

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Timestamp offset, used for pagination

parameters.name: limit

day.description: Date that was evaluated from the request

get.summary: Last Trade for a Currency Pair
get.description: Get Last Trade Tick for a Currency Pair.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From Symbol of the pair

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To Symbol of the pair

200.description: Last tick for this currency pair

symbol.description: Symbol Pair that was evaluated from the request

get.description: Get the last trade for a given stock.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the stock to get

symbol.description: Symbol that was evaluated from the request

get.summary: Last Quote for a Currency Pair
get.description: Get Last Quote Tick for a Currency Pair.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From Symbol of the pair

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To Symbol of the pair

200.description: Last quote tick for this currency pair

symbol.description: Symbol Pair that was evaluated from the request

get.description: Get the last quote tick for a given stock.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the stock to get

200.description: Last quote tick for this stock

symbol.description: Symbol that was evaluated from the request

k.description: Transactions ( 1 transaction contains X shares exchanged )

v.description: Total Volume of all trades ( total shares exchanged )

country.description: Country in which this country is based.

exchange.description: Exchange this company is traded on.

marketcap.description: Market cap as of the last updated timestamp.

sector.description: Sector that this company is traded in.

symbol.description: The actual exchange symbol this company is traded under.

updated.description: Last time this company record was updated.

e.description: The exchange this trade happened on
